snippet.title: Mindshadow for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

Amiga
Amstrad CPC
Apple II
Atari ST
Commodore 64
Macintosh
PC Booter
ZX Spectrum


Game description:

At the beginning of Mindshadow you find yourself on a lonely beach in a lifeless hut. With a headache and no memory.

The object of the game is to completely regain your memory. As you progress in the game a word or phrase will trigger memories of the past. Like most adventure games the fun of the game is centered on discovery of you and your surroundings.


What I think:

This is a fun game, but the levels\locations feel rather short and the game itself as a whole isn't really a long game either.

I show you the first 2 levels till I have to swap the disk on the 2nd level.
